text: The Huntress, also known as Helena Rosa Bertinelli, is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. She is a longtime member of the Birds of Prey. == In other media == In the first two seasons of Arrow, Helena Bertinelli is played by actress Jessica De Gouw. The character made her cinematic debut in the DC Extended Universe movie Birds of Prey (2020), portrayed by Mary Elizabeth Winstead. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1989 Category:DC Comics superheroes
title: Huntress (Helena Bertinelli)
